descripcion:
Ideal for vegetable and tobacco transplants, young seedlings and newly-set cuttings. Provides extra water soluble phosphorous to help stimulate root development. Excellent whenever tests indicate the need for extra phosphate.

DERIVED FROM: Potassium Nitrate, Ammonium Sulfate, Mono Ammonium Phosphate, Mono Potassium Phosphate, Magnesium Sulfate, Iron EDDHA, Iron EDTA, Manganese EDTA, Copper EDTA, Zinc EDTA, Boric Acid, Sodium Molybdate. F1367

POTENTIAL BASICITY: 690 lbs calcium carbonate equivalent per ton.
